name: Polar Battle
description:
Those annoying critters overtook the snowmens' territory again. Time to brutally massacre them.

Polar Battle is an inversed tower-defence game full of unique and eccentric snow-themed units. Confront creatures in randomly generated levels, strategically place troops to overthrow your foes, and collect new snowmen to take with you to battle. With elaborate plans and diversified troops, overcome the inconvenient horde.

Credits:

Game, Art, and Music by LazerRock 

Playtesting: Alblox, J.Barrios, themissinglint, Arurikku

Sound Effects gotten from freesound.org and Sound Library

Inspired by that PvZ minigame
